articles.title: Raptors' Jalen Harris banned one year for drug violation - Reuters
articles.description: Toronto Raptors guard Jalen Harris has been dismissed and disqualified from the NBA for violating terms of the anti-drug program, the league announced Thursday.
articles.content: May 14, 2021; Dallas, Texas, USA; Toronto Raptors guard Jalen Harris (2) dribbles the ball past Dallas Mavericks guard Josh Richardson (0) during the third quarter at American Airlines Center. Mandat… [+1266 chars]

articles.title: Blue Jays activate RHP Rafael Dolis from IL - Reuters
articles.description: The Toronto Blue Jays reinstated right-hander Rafael Dolis from the 10-day injured list ahead of Sunday's game against the Tampa Bay Rays in Buffalo, N.Y.

articles.title: Thieves, OpTiC stay perfect in CDL Stage 5 - Reuters
articles.description: The Los Angeles Thieves and OpTiC Chicago improved to 2-0 while the Toronto Ultra won their Stage 5 debut Sunday in the Call of Duty League.
articles.content:

articles.title: Empire pounce on Ultra for 1st place at CDL Stage 5 - Reuters
articles.description: The Dallas Empire pounced on the previously unbeaten Toronto Ultra Sunday to claim first place in Group B on the final day of group-stage play at the Call of Duty League's Stage 5.

articles.title: Alex Verdugo's homer lifts Red Sox over Blue Jays - Reuters
articles.description: Alex Verdugo crushed a go-ahead two-run home run in the eighth inning to carry the Boston Red Sox past the visiting Toronto Blue Jays 5-4 in the opener of a four-game series Monday night.
